body_html:
I tried to simplify the macros, please have a look.

One headache is that the destination data type is known at compile time, while the source data type is known only at runtime. So the conversions to and from half need to be provided in different ways.

I tried to simplify the macros, please have a look. 

One headache is that the destination data type is known at compile time, while the source data type is known only at runtime. So the conversions to and from half need to be provided in different ways.
